Hot Rod.assessment: Shows leadership skills and tactical awareness, reflecting strong competence in battle situations.

Hot Rod.action: Leads the final attack that disables Unicron by shooting out his second eye and spreading Autobot essence throughout his body.
Hot Rod.assessment: This decisive and successful action highlights Hot Rod's strategic thinking and combat effectiveness, confirming his competence.

Hot Rod.action: Delivers a hopeful speech about ending the Cybertronian wars and moving towards peace.
Hot Rod.assessment: Demonstrates confidence and vision as a leader, which are aspects of competence beyond physical skill.
